SQLs.SQL:
select * from (
SELECT t.*, g.fuwujgmc FROM ( SELECT nr.visitunitcode fuwujgbh, COUNT (*) AS allnum FROM cdh_newbornrecord nr where 1 = 1 and nr.tianbiaosj >= @日期范围Start and nr.tianbiaosj >= @日期范围End GROUP BY nr.visitunitcode ) t LEFT JOIN GY_FUWUJG g ON g.FUWUJGBH = t.fuwujgbh where 1=1 and dizhibm = @dizhibm and fuwujgbh = @organization and g.fuwujgmc like @单位名称 order by g.fuwujgbh asc @Pager ) gj left join ( select h.uploadunit fuwujgbh, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(yy, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<3 and h.screentype = 1 then 1 else 0 end)yiners, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<=28 and h.screentype = 1 then 1 else 0 end)babys, sum(case when DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=3 and DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<7 and h.screentype = 1 then 1 else 0 end)childs, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(yy, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<3 and h.screentype = 1 and h.complex != 1 then 1 else 0 end)yinersno, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<=28 and h.screentype = 1 and h.complex != 1 then 1 else 0 end)babysno, sum(case when DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=3 and DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<7 and h.screentype = 1 and h.complex != 1 then 1 else 0 end)childsno, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(yy, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<3 and h.screentype = 1 and h.complex != 1 and h.recall = 1 then 1 else 0 end)yinersback, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<=28 and h.screentype = 1 and h.complex != 1 and h.recall = 1 then 1 else 0 end)babysback, sum(case when DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=3 and DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<7 and h.screentype = 1 and h.complex != 1 and h.recall = 1 then 1 else 0 end)childsback, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(yy, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<3 and h.screentype = 2 and h.complex != 1 then 1 else 0 end)yinersno2, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<=28 and h.screentype = 2 and h.complex != 1 then 1 else 0 end)babysno2, sum(case when DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=3 and DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<7 and h.screentype = 2 and h.complex != 1 then 1 else 0 end)childsno2, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(yy, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<3 and h.screentype = 2 and h.complex != 1 and h.recall = 1 then 1 else 0 end)yinersback2, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<=28 and h.screentype = 2 and h.complex != 1 and h.recall = 1 then 1 else 0 end)babysback2, sum(case when DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=3 and DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<7 and h.screentype = 2 and h.complex != 1 and h.recall = 1 then 1 else 0 end)childsback2, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(yy, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<3 and h.screentype = 2 and h.complex != 1 then 1 else 0 end)yinersresult, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<=28 and h.screentype = 2 and h.complex != 1 then 1 else 0 end)babysresult, sum(case when DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=3 and DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<7 and h.screentype = 2 and h.complex != 1 then 1 else 0 end)childsresult from ( select t.* from ( select *, row_number() over(partition by childid, screentype order by createtime desc) as rowindex from cc_hearscreen where status = 1 and inputdate >= @日期范围Start and inputdate >= @日期范围End )t where t.rowindex = 1 )h left join cc_generalinfo g on h.childid = g.childid left join GY_FUWUJG f on h.uploadunit = f.fuwujgbh group by h.uploadunit, f.fuwujgmc ) p1 on gj.fuwujgbh = p1.fuwujgbh

Source.CountSQL: select count(*) from (SELECT nr.visitunitcode fuwujgbh FROM cdh_newbornrecord nr where 1 = 1 and nr.tianbiaosj >= @日期范围Start and nr.tianbiaosj >= @日期范围End GROUP BY nr.visitunitcode ) t LEFT JOIN GY_FUWUJG g ON g.FUWUJGBH = t.fuwujgbh where 1=1 and dizhibm = @dizhibm and fuwujgbh = @organization and g.fuwujgmc like @单位名称
